item.title: Microseismicity in South Island, New Zealand
item.description: Seismicity rate changes when the stress state in the crust changes. Both seismicity and geodetic data are readily available to us.

item.title: Earthquake Model of the Middle East
item.description: EFEHR portal Model component Seismogenic Source Models Catalogs Faults Ground Motion Models Technical stuff [[notes/OpenQuake|OpenQuake]] QGIS Key publications Şeşetyan, K.

item.title: Seismic Tomography
item.description: Finite-frequency tomography For my master thesis with Prof Shu-Huei Hung, I work with finite-frequency tomography to image the mantle below Basin and Range province, USA.

item.title: Simulate earthquake sequences in 3-D fault systems
item.description: How to create a synthetic seismic sequence? Surely one can use the statistics to generate one. But we know plates move and faults slide.
